entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain early this evening. Rain beginning this evening changing to snow later this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 5 cm. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
